thread.title: Phil
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Phil

author: Phil
title: Phil
text:
Initial order was a little small and so we returned it, using their simple instructions and ordered the next size up.
Upon receipt of the return they immediately contacted us and told us that they would ship the new item within 10 days, as they were out of stock. Amazingly, within 4 days the replacement item arrived, fitted perfectly and there were no additional charges.
So, a really good outlet to buy from and we will shop again.
